009package imagingbook.sampleimages;
010
011import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
012
013
014public enum GeneralTestImage implements ImageResource {
015                DotBlot("Dot_Blot.png"),
016                Blobs("blobs.png"),
017                BoatsFilter3x3("boats-filter3x3.png"),
018                Boats("boats.png"),
019                CatSkeleton("cat-skeleton.png"),
020                Cat("cat.png"),
021                ClownFilter3x3("clown-filter3x3.png"),
022                ClownGauss3("clown-gauss3.png"),
023                ClownMedianScalar3("clown-median-scalar-3.png"),
024                ClownMedianVector3L1("clown-median-vector-3-L1.png"),
025                ClownMedianVectorsharpen3L1("clown-median-vectorsharpen-3-L1.png"),
026                Clown("clown.png"),
027                MonasterySmallFilter3x3("monastery-small-filter3x3.png"),
028                MonasterySmallGauss3("monastery-small-gauss3.png"),
029                MonasterySmall("monastery-small.png"),
030                RhinoBigCrop("rhino-big-crop.png"),
031                SegmentationMed("segmentation-med.png"),
032                SegmentationSmall("segmentation-small.png"),
033                SimpleTestGridImg("simple-test-grid-img.png"),
034                SimpleTestGridImg2("simple-test-grid-img2.png");
035        
036        private static final String BASEDIR = "general/";
037        
038        private final String relPath;
039        
040        @Override
041        public String getRelativePath() {
042                return relPath;
043        }
044        
045        GeneralTestImage(String filename) {
046                this.relPath = BASEDIR + filename;
047        }
048}
